WRITING.TITLE: What shows were you misled from trailers, synopsis, etc?
WRITING.TEXT: The trailer for the first season of The Americans gave me the impression that it's in the action thriller genre but the whole show is actually a family drama with spy elements. Still a good show though. Any similar experience you had with some other shows?
So how long before we hear someone getting killed because they were smoking?
Thanks man. Just something I needed to hear right now. :)
It'll get better. I really dig the AI graphics too. Hope you stick around with it.

It's hard seeing my high school friends graduating while I'm still 2nd year in my course. (I shifted and transferred kasi) Makes me so jealous and regret the early decisions I made after graduating from high school. Oh well. :(

You're in for a ride, my friend. It's one of the best shows on network TV sa US. It'll feel very CSI for the first few seasons but trust me the show will evolve into something much more complex once it delves deeper into its AI mythos.
When "Don't You" comes up during the final scene of "The Luck of the Fryrish" on Futurama.
Meeting people is easy.
[Kuya Wil is preparing for the most intense episode of Wowowin yet](http://imgur.com/a/eCvCV)
This is why prefer 24 Oras over TV Patrol. Daming side comment sa latter. They should just do their jobs and deliver the news straightforward.
I often go there and jesus christ I can confirm this! Especially sa mga skater keedzz sa parking lot.
No problem, True Love Waits (Live In Oslo)
Also less jeje kasi mostly poor sila
Terra Nova.
Oh youuu...
Ok maybe I should've gone with best child haha. But I do have a little brother and big sister but I'm still essentially the black sheep of the family.

Made a greeting card from one of those "5 Minute Crafts" video on Facebook to give to my mom later today. First time ko mag effort ng ganito hehe. Pakonswelo nalang din for not being the best son in the family. I love you Mom! Happy Mother's Day to you guys as well!! :)
How To Disappear Completely
High and Dry
LICK! LICK! LICK MA BALLS!
Worship me!
says goodbye *Because I can't do it face to face*
*listens to Radiohead even more to fuel the abandonment
*high fives!
Radiohead fan too, eh?
*I am all the days that you choose to ignore*
shy aqu haha. But anyways, lagi nalang trim gupit ko. I tried undercut last year but it just fueled my self loathing. Any suggestions guys? My friend told me try ko daw yung "fade".
Never ako lumabas ng barber shop na masaya sa sarili ko.
Me and this guy went on a movie date last week and we were holding hands really low of our seats so people in the cinema couldn't see it. We just don't want the attention.
Ohh have you watched Popstar: Never Stop Never Stopping? It has some really good and hilarious songs.
ikr! He's the Hans Zimmer of TV.
